name: Dark Everywhere
description: simply turns to dark theme almost all webs
additional_info:
Released for everyone who prefers browsing in dark :)
Feel free to use it, change it or whatever.
Sorry but i will not be here regularly so it is your luck if i find some bug report from you.
This is completely free, so you can simply take it and ask someone somewhere to help you ;)

Version 0.4
- only white shade of links, hope it will please you, if not please leave comment i will create another style
   with links colored like in 0.3 version
- fixed color of css code on this site :)
Version 0.3
- color of link lighten for better reading on mobile
Version 0.2
- changed color of links
- some fixing
Version 0.1
